content.question: Constantin Brancusi recommended that The Kiss be displayed without a base because a pedestal would have

choices.label: presented a safety hazard in that the sculpture might topple
detracted from the essential nature of the limestone
required a larger block of the same quarried marble
limited the number of interested collectors

content.answer: detracted from the essential nature of the limestone

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
